section.title: <xar:mlvar />
section.t: Contains a string passed to an accompanying <xar:mlkey /> or <xar:mlstring /> to occupy a place holder.

section.title: Syntax examples
section.t: See <xar:ml /> for syntax examples using placeholders.

ed:issue.name: mlvar can be replaced
ed:issue.ed:item: This tag can be removed, using xar:var in its place is totally possible, but has serious migration issues, since its syntax is different from this tag.

The syntax of this tag is wrong, it does not designate a variable at all. It envelopes it, which makes it susceptible for textnode generation (a simple space would do that for example, which we have to create workarounds for, at the moment)
